description:
You walk back into your bedroom, catch the whiff of who knows what, but it reeks. Like, a condensed fart produced after a feed of honey chilli beef from the China Inn.
Don't think you have anything left to do here

responses.look: Bombscare of a room. Were it not your own you'd be worried about your health

defaults: Talking like a man with half a naggin' in him
Any chance of you talking some sense there?
As the saying goes, "What in under God are you blatherin on about?"
